ai.legendary

Class Reformatter

  • java.lang.Object
    • ai.legendary.Reformatter

  • public class Reformatter
extends java.lang.Object
    This method finds the base word of intended word, then adds suffixes and prefixes to change various features, such as part of speech and meaning. It only returns the words that are in the dictionary. Creates a DictionaryAccess class on initialization, which loads everything into HashMaps, so try to only initialize it once.
    Version:
    8/10/2017
    Author:
    ToddSandberg
